amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the use of funds for programs that assist in the training of automotive technicians in diesel retrofitting, hybrid, hydrogen, and alternative fuel automotive technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-69 to provide that local funds may be used for programs that assist in the training of automotive technicians in diesel retrofitting, hybrid, hydrogen, and alternative fuel automotive technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
